title: How Do: Lux

embed.description: Insightful gameplay mechanics, presented in a cinematic viewing experience to chilled out, Anime style music. Or something, I dunno. I just make this up as I go. Also, thanks to Shawn Wasabi for letting me use his mash-up track. I heard it, and just thought that Lux would fit so well with it.

body:
After many MANY hours editing, it's done.

posting at 6am without sleep. I'll respond to stuff when I wake up.

replies.body: My Girlfriend sent this to me last night no idea how she found it but it is the best thing!!!! :3 !!!!!!!!!!!! {{champion:99}}  <3   !!!!!!
Is it just me or does the music in the end credits go all Final Fantasy for a second there.
